mapper.select: /* UserAuthGrpMapper.getAuthGrpUsers [UserAuthGrp.xml] */ select caug.user_id ,cu.user_nm ,cd.dept_nm ,cd.dept_cd ,caug.auth_grp_no ,cag.auth_grp_nm ,caug.create_user_id ,caug.create_dt from com_user_auth_grp caug inner join com_user cu on caug.user_id = cu.user_id inner join com_dept cd on cu.dept_cd = cd.dept_cd inner join com_auth_grp cag on caug.auth_grp_no = cag.auth_grp_no where caug.auth_grp_no = #{authGrpNo}

/* UserAuthGrpMapper.getAuthGrpDepts [UserAuthGrp.xml] */ select cdag.dept_cd ,cd.dept_nm ,cd.dept_lvl ,deptLvl.code_nm as dept_lvl_nm ,cdag.auth_grp_no ,cdag.create_user_id ,cdag.create_dt from com_dept_auth_grp cdag inner join com_dept cd on cdag.dept_cd = cd.dept_cd inner join com_code_master deptLvl on cd.dept_lvl = deptLvl.code and deptLvl.code_group_cd = 'COM_DEPT_LVL' where cdag.auth_grp_no = #{authGrpNo}

/* UserAuthGrpMapper.getAuth [UserAuthGrp.xml] */ with A as ( select cdag.auth_grp_no ,isnull(cdag.plant_access_yn, 'N') as plant_access_yn ,isnull(cdag.dept_access_yn, 'N') as dept_access_yn from com_dept_auth_grp cdag inner join com_dept cd on cdag.dept_cd = cd.dept_cd where 1=1 and cdag.dept_cd = (select dept_cd from com_user cu where user_id = #{userId}) union all select cuag.auth_grp_no ,isnull(cuag.plant_access_yn, 'N') as plant_access_yn ,isnull(cuag.dept_access_yn, 'N') as dept_access_yn from com_user_auth_grp cuag inner join com_user cu on cuag.user_id = cu.user_id inner join com_dept cd on cu.dept_cd = cd.dept_cd where 1=1 and cuag.user_id = #{userId} ) select auth_grp_no ,max(plant_access_yn) as plant_access_yn ,max(dept_access_yn) as dept_access_yn from A group by auth_grp_no

/* UserAuthGrpMapper.getAuthPlants [UserAuthGrp.xml] */ select cdag.dept_cd ,cd.dept_nm ,cd.dept_lvl ,deptLvl.code_nm as dept_lvl_nm ,'' as plant_cd ,'' as plant_nm ,cdag.auth_grp_no ,isnull(cdag.plant_access_yn, 'N') as plant_access_yn ,isnull(cdag.dept_access_yn, 'N') as dept_access_yn ,cdag.create_user_id ,cdag.create_dt ,cd.dept_nm + ' 부서원 전체' as comment ,'' as user_id from com_dept_auth_grp cdag inner join com_dept cd on cdag.dept_cd = cd.dept_cd inner join com_code_master deptLvl on cd.dept_lvl = deptLvl.code and deptLvl.code_group_cd = 'COM_DEPT_LVL' where cdag.auth_grp_no = #{authGrpNo} and cdag.plant_access_yn = 'Y' union all select cd.dept_cd ,cd.dept_nm ,cd.dept_lvl ,deptLvl.code_nm as dept_lvl_nm ,cu.plant_cd ,plant.code_nm as plant_nm ,cuag.auth_grp_no ,isnull(cuag.plant_access_yn, 'N') as plant_access_yn ,isnull(cuag.dept_access_yn, 'N') as dept_access_yn ,cuag.create_user_id ,cuag.create_dt ,'(개인) ' + cu.user_id as comment ,cu.user_id from com_user_auth_grp cuag inner join com_user cu on cuag.user_id = cu.user_id inner join com_dept cd on cu.dept_cd = cd.dept_cd inner join com_code_master plant on cu.plant_cd = plant.code and plant.code_group_cd = 'COM_PLANT_CD' inner join com_code_master deptLvl on cd.dept_lvl = deptLvl.code and deptLvl.code_group_cd = 'COM_DEPT_LVL' where cuag.auth_grp_no = #{authGrpNo} and cuag.plant_access_yn = 'Y'

/* UserAuthGrpMapper.getAuthDepts [UserAuthGrp.xml] */ select cdag.dept_cd ,cd.dept_nm ,cd.dept_lvl ,deptLvl.code_nm as dept_lvl_nm ,'' as plant_cd ,'' as plant_nm ,cdag.auth_grp_no ,isnull(cdag.plant_access_yn, 'N') as plant_access_yn ,isnull(cdag.dept_access_yn, 'N') as dept_access_yn ,cdag.create_user_id ,cdag.create_dt ,cd.dept_nm + ' 부서원 전체' as comment ,'' as user_id from com_dept_auth_grp cdag inner join com_dept cd on cdag.dept_cd = cd.dept_cd inner join com_code_master deptLvl on cd.dept_lvl = deptLvl.code and deptLvl.code_group_cd = 'COM_DEPT_LVL' where cdag.auth_grp_no = #{authGrpNo} and cdag.dept_access_yn = 'Y' union all select cd.dept_cd ,cd.dept_nm ,cd.dept_lvl ,deptLvl.code_nm as dept_lvl_nm ,cu.plant_cd ,plant.code_nm as plant_nm ,cuag.auth_grp_no ,isnull(cuag.plant_access_yn, 'N') as plant_access_yn ,isnull(cuag.dept_access_yn, 'N') as dept_access_yn ,cuag.create_user_id ,cuag.create_dt ,'(개인) ' + cu.user_id as comment ,cu.user_id from com_user_auth_grp cuag inner join com_user cu on cuag.user_id = cu.user_id inner join com_dept cd on cu.dept_cd = cd.dept_cd inner join com_code_master plant on cu.plant_cd = plant.code and plant.code_group_cd = 'COM_PLANT_CD' inner join com_code_master deptLvl on cd.dept_lvl = deptLvl.code and deptLvl.code_group_cd = 'COM_DEPT_LVL' where cuag.auth_grp_no = #{authGrpNo} and cuag.dept_access_yn = 'Y'
